abstract: The Walt Disney Company has long maintained rigid walls between its character and movie franchises, but a new game is tearing them down.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company has long maintained rigid walls between its character and movie franchises, but a new game is tearing them down.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Imagine monster truck tires on Cinderella’s carriage. Or Capt. Jack Sparrow being smacked around by Sulley from “Monsters Inc.” Maybe Mr. Incredible, armed with a toilet-paper-roll launcher, riding in Peter Pan’s flying pirate ship.

headline.main: Video Game Combines the Worlds of Disney
headline.print_headline: Mix and Match Characters In New Disney Video Game
